title: Pixel 3 (non-XL) keeps restarting and rebooting. Need help ASAP. Can't use volume buttons.
content:
Tried to put device in safe mode or master reset but device continues to restart whenever power button or volume buttons are depressed.

This is not my device, this is my friends that I'm trying to help him fix.

He States he updated the device March 5th and it restarted randomly 2 days in a row. On the 3rd day it got stuck on the bootloader.

Please help.
